title: Blossom du Jour - Union Square
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Catering
description: A fast food version of Blossom Restaurant with multiple NYC outlets; this one opened fall-2015. Offers vegan food and drinks: wraps, burgers, salads, raw pizza, raw burrito, soups, fresh juices, smoothies, and sweets. Quick service style with some seating, no bathroom.
